text:
The #AU just signs a deal with #Johnson&Johnson for 220 (+ 180) millions #COVID19 #vaccine 's doses for US$2 billions
#vaccines to be manufactured in #SouthAfrica

Months ago I underscored how lucky #AfricanUnion was to have @CyrilRamaphosa as sitting president during a #pandemic https://t.co/ONcVSqp2gE
